sentences.sContent: It would be somewhere over there off the charts.
sentences.sContent_eng: It would be somewhere over there off the charts.
sentences.sCn: 它就会在那里，图外那一带的某个地方。

sentences.sContent: The accident aeroplane was still nosed over there.
sentences.sContent_eng: The accident aeroplane was still nosed over there.
sentences.sCn: 那架失事飞机还在那里倾覆着。

sentences.sContent: Our kids are over there, all the rest of the family are there.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our kids are over there, all the rest of the family are there.
sentences.sCn: 我们的孩子在那里，家里所有其他人也都在那里。
